title: in the case of village settlements in the Western Ghat hilly area (eco sensitive zone) in Regional Plan of Satara, Pune, (1) Ahmednagar, Dhule, Kolhapur, Nashik, Nandurbar, Sangli, Sindhudurg, Thane, Palghar and Raigad District or as notified by Govt
clause_text: in the case of village settlements in the Western Ghat hilly area (eco sensitive zone) in Regional Plan of Satara, Pune, (1) Ahmednagar, Dhule, Kolhapur, Nashik, Nandurbar, Sangli, Sindhudurg, Thane, Palghar and Raigad District or as notified by Govt. from time to time such distance shall be 200 m. only
